item.title: The Little Schemer
item.description: The Little Schemer by Friedman, Felleisen 1. Toys ; Is 'x' an atom (define atom? (lambda(x) (and (not (pair? x)) (not (null? x))))) 2. Do It, Do It Again, and Again, and Again… ; Is 'l' a list of atoms (define lat? (lambda(l) (cond ((null? l) #t) ((atom? (car l)) (lat? (cdr l))) (else #f)))) ; Is 'a' a member of 'lat' (define member? (lambda (a lat) (cond ((null? lat) #f) (else (or (eq?
